Name: Street Dreams
About the game: Street Dreams is a minimal, fast-paced VR shooter set in a psychedelic dream world. Choose from a variety of weapons to defend yourself from oncoming opponents, gain points, and earn yourself a position on the global leaderboard! Inspired by works such as Mad Max: Fury Road and Grand Theft Auto , Street Dreams places you in a high-speed car chase with the goal to wreak havoc on your pursuers. Features Five unique weapons to use throughout each car chase - whether you want to maximise points, maintain high accuracy, or need to get yourself out of a tight situation - the gun you need is at an arm's reach. Compete for the crown - Rack up as many points as possible to score the number one spot on the leaderboards. An intense, modern soundtrack to accompany your journey, from various producers and sub-genres.
